For a cat of his nature the cave and the darkness were home to Nightshift a=
s his cat green eyes naturally adjust to the dark.  

" check it out, there=
's a whole other ecosystem in here. "

He watches as cave insects and bats =
move around on the walls and ceilings of the caverns.  Glow worms string th=
eir fluorescent pearls of saliva making them glimmer like jewels.  It was u=
nlike anything that Nightshift had ever seen before and is taken in awe by =
its sight.

" Promise me we aren't gonna do any harm in here guys."

Local =
artist who specializes in illustration, using traditional and digital media=
.  

I also specialize in hand made crafts.  Great for any occasion!

d a great gift idea that is original?  No problem!  Email me at this addres=
s and we will talk.
